results.content: Lectures were slow and confusing. Will be taking other Backbone JS courses that I hope will compensate for important parts I missed here.
results.content_html: Lectures were slow and confusing. Will be taking other Backbone JS courses that I hope will compensate for important parts I missed here.

results.content: The first part is fine, but once you get to Views, there is not enough information for complete understanding. I am having to look outside the course to understand what I am doing and make things work outside of direct copy and paste. It is also hard to tell which exercise files he is using.
